primaryaqsensor.helper: Sets the Air Quality sensor to use for graphing and sending to third parties, leave undefined to suppress AQ graph data generation. Note: AirLink Indoor values are not sent to third parties or the default web page.

aqi.helper: Select the AQI index calcuation method you want to use

apiKey.helper: Enter this only if your AirLink is not added as a node to your WeatherLink Live station

apiSecret.helper: Enter this only if your AirLink is not added as a node to your WeatherLink Live station

autoUpdateIp.rightLabel: Use automatic IP address discovery and updates
autoUpdateIp.helper: NOTE: only enable this if you have a single AirLink device and it uses DCHP

indoorenabled.helper: AirLinks have to be defined as indoor or outdoor devices. The CumulusMX assignment MUST match the choice made on weatherlink.com

isNode.rightLabel: This AirLink has been added as Node to another station
isNode.helper: Enable this if you added the AirLink as a node to an existing weatherlink.com station. Disable if this AirLink is configured as a standalone station.

hostname.helper: You can enter the Airlink host name if you know it (lowercase). If you only have one Airlink device you can leave this blank and it will be populated for you

stationId.helper: Enter the weatherlink.com Station ID - you can leave this blank if you already entered it for your WLL device and this AirLink has been added as a node to the same station, it will be completed automatically

outdoorenabled.helper: AirLinks have to be defined as indoor or outdoor devices. The CumulusMX assignment MUST match the choice made on weatherlink.com
